[!TODO] TODO :: Turn mentioned definitions into links [!SUMMARY] In the beginning of the United States, the separation of powers between the state and federal government was in contention.

[[Max Planck]] (in 1900) discovered that when you heat a solid to a high [[Temperature]], the [[Solid]] emits a particular [[Energy]] (ex: [[Color]]) ex: $\text{Fe}$ when heated $\rightarrow$ red $\rightarrow$ orange $\rightarrow$ white $\rightarrow$ blue $E = h\nu$ ($\nu$ = [[nu]], means [[Frequency]]) Related: [[Fluorescence]], [[Phosphorescence]] [[Albert Einstein]] (in 1921) discovered the [[Photoelectric Effect]] !
